1.0.0.name: connect20/Ocodewire_Pricebargain
1.0.0.description: By the Price Bargain Extension buyers can bargain the price of the particular products through the product listing as well as the products page. By sending the price to the store owner for the acceptance, refusal, or make new offers.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
